text: Nia daangada ala i golo, ala digi daaligidia go nia hagaduadua aanei, digaula digi huli gi daha mo nadau mee ala ne bida hai go ginaadou. Digaula digi dugua nadau hai daumaha ang gi nia hagataalunga huaidu, be go nia ada balu god ala ne hai gi nia goolo, silber, baalanga mmee, hadu mo laagau, ala e deemee di mmada, hagalongo be taele.9.20 Pisalem 115.4-7; 135.15-17; Daniel 5.23
